name: The Last Human Part 2
short_description: Sarah hid during an apocalpse and when she woke nobody was alive but her. Sarah had brown hair, yellowish teeth, dark tan skin, and she always wears her blue teeshirt, with black jeans, and red sneakers. She was so scared that she ran all the way to her home to try and find anyone still alive. When she got there she relized there was nobody left. Sarah thought that the military might have made everyone leave to a special facility, so she looked for and thing that resembled military equipment. She searched her whole city, which took a couple of days, after a while she realized that her whole family's bodies were laying dead around her! After many lonely days she decided to kill herself instead of dieing slowly, and normaly. But, right when she had given up hope, she found out that a boy the same age as her, 25, named Luke, was left half alive! Ahe rushed to him and saved him. Luke said," Why would you save me if we were going to die anyway?" Sarah replied," Nobody else is left, we are..
summary: Sarah hid during an apocalpse and when she woke nobody was alive.
